TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ValidationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public MustInherit Class ValidationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ValidationAttribute abstract : Attribute

summary.span: 充当所有验证特性的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all validation attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类基于与数据表关联的元数据强制实施验证。This class enforces validation, based on the metadata that is associated with the data table. 您可以重写此类，以创建自定义验证特性。You can override this class to create custom validation attributes.

related.span: 如何：使用自定义特性自定义数据模型中的数据字段验证

span.span: How to: Customize Data Field Validation in the Data Model Using Custom Attributes

remarks.format: ## 对继承者的说明Note to inheritors 此构造函数选择一个非常通用的验证错误消息。This constructor chooses a very generic validation error message. ValidationAttribute 的开发人员应使用其他构造函数或提供更好的消息。Developers subclassing ValidationAttribute should use other constructors or supply a better message.

summary.span: 获取或设置一条在验证失败的情况下与验证控件关联的错误消息。

span.span: Gets or sets an error message to associate with a validation control if validation fails.

value.span: 与验证控件关联的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that is associated with the validation control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是与验证控件关联的错误消息。This property is the error message that you associate with the validation control. 它用于未本地化的错误消息。It is used for non-localized error messages.

span.span: Gets or sets the error message resource name to use in order to look up the property value if validation fails.

span.span: The error message resource that is associated with a validation control.

summary.span: 获取本地化的验证错误消息。

span.span: Gets the localized validation error message.

span.span: The localized validation error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过计算 属性或通过计算和属性来获取错误消息字符串 。The error message string is obtained by evaluating the property or by evaluating the and properties. 这两种情况是互相排斥的。The two cases are mutually exclusive. 如果要显示本地化的错误消息，则使用第二种情况。The second case is used if you want to display a localized error message.

summary.span: 基于发生错误的数据字段对错误消息应用格式设置。

span.span: Applies formatting to an error message, based on the data field where the error occurred.

returns.span: 带有格式的错误消息的实例。

span.span: An instance of the formatted error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用属性对错误消息进行格式设置 。This method formats an error message by using the property. 此方法将触发错误的数据字段的名称追加到格式化的错误消息中。This method appends the name of the data field that triggered the error to the formatted error message. 您可以通过创建一个重写此方法的派生类来自定义错误消息的格式化方式。You can customize how the error message is formatted by creating a derived class that overrides this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用 方法来确定参数指定的对象是否 `value` 有效。This method calls the method to determine whether the object that is specified by the `value` parameter is valid. 如果该 方法返回 `false` ，则此方法将调用 方法来获取说明该问题的本地化消息。If the method returns `false`, this method calls the method to get a localized message that states the problem. 然后，它会引发 异常。It then throws a exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法验证要在其上声明属性的对象或属性的值 。This method validates the value of the object or property on which the attribute is declared. 它调用 方法并将 `value` 作为参数传递。It calls the method and passes `value` as a parameter. 如果验证失败，则 会引发异常。If validation fails, a exception is thrown.
